column3: Latest;“There is no where to hide no rock to crawl under WE WILL find you”------An active manhunt continues across Cambodia for the suspect in a ------double homicide. ------The Child Protection Unit
column4: National Police and Sihanoukville Police Command continue their search for a 30 year old male
column5: Chhim Vichet (pictured) who is wanted in connection with the rape and murder of 2 children in the coastal city of Sihanoukville on the 29th of May 2019.------Task Force “India” members have promised that all resources will be used to locate the suspect and bring him to justice for what has been described as a vicious and brutal attack on 2 defenceless children.------CPU
